about_the_game:
Step into the evolved world of CODEDOOR, where you are dropped into an eerie, abandoned area teeming with scattered containers. Each container is secured with a unique code, regenerated each time you play, challenging you to locate and unlock the correct one using the specific code you are given.

In this updated version, not only must you find the correct container, but you must also survive against relentless zombies that stalk the abandoned grounds. Armed with the newly added M1911 pistol, you can now defend yourself, adding a thrilling layer of strategy to your survival tactics.

Succeed in unlocking the container and you survive to advance to the next level. Achieve the ultimate victory by reaching Wave 10 and accumulating 30 kills to unlock and launch the nuke, which decisively ends your game in a climactic explosion. This version of CODEDOOR is not just a continuation but an escalation of the intricate journey that’s set to unfold.

In this updated version, not only must you find the correct container, but you must also survive against relentless zombies that stalk the abandoned grounds. Armed with the newly added M1911 pistol, you can now defend yourself, adding a thrilling layer of strategy to your survival tactics.

Succeed in unlocking the container and you survive to advance to the next level. Achieve the ultimate victory by reaching Wave 10 and accumulating 30 kills to unlock and launch the nuke, which decisively ends your game in a climactic explosion. name: CODEDOOR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 960 4GB or AMD R9 290 4GB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In CODEDOOR, navigate an abandoned area filled with containers, each locked with a unique code. Armed with only a code, find and unlock the correct container to survive against zombies and progress to the next level. Exciting, strategic gameplay with the added thrill of combat awaits!
